mapper.sql: id, mainmid, submid, subnumber, remark, operator, opttime
mapper.select: SELECT min(FLOOR(case when canas>ifnull(inv.quantity,0)/(e.units) then ifnull(inv.quantity,0)/(e.units) ELSE canas END)) amount FROM ( SELECT e.materialid, max(e.amount/f.amount) units, SUM(f.amount-f.amount_handle) canas from t_erp_assembly_form f left join t_erp_assembly_form_entry e on f.id=e.formid WHERE f.warehouseid=#{warehouseid,jdbcType=CHAR} and f.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} and (auditstatus=1 OR auditstatus=2) AND (f.amount>ifnull(f.amount_handle,0)) and f.ftype='ass' and f.mainmid=#{materialid,jdbcType=CHAR} GROUP BY e.materialid ) e left join t_erp_inventory inv on inv.materialid=e.materialid and inv.warehouseid=#{warehouseid,jdbcType=CHAR} and inv.status='fulfillable'

SELECT min( IFNULL( ( SELECT SUM(inv.quantity) FROM t_erp_inventory inv left join t_erp_warehouse w on w.id=inv.warehouseid WHERE (w.id=#{warehouseid,jdbcType=CHAR} or w.parentid=#{warehouseid,jdbcType=CHAR} ) AND w.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} AND inv.materialid=a.submid and inv.status='fulfillable' ) ,0)/a.subnumber ) from t_erp_assembly a left join t_erp_material m on m.id=a.mainmid where mainmid = #{materialid,jdbcType=CHAR} and m.shopid = #{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} and a.ftype='ass'

select IFNULL(pic.location,pic.url) image,m.name name, m.color color,ifnull(m.boxnum,0) boxnum, m.sku sku ,m.price price ,c.name supplier,m.delivery_cycle,a.subnumber MOQ,i2.inbound, i2.outbound,i2.fulfillable,a.mainmid from t_erp_assembly a left join t_erp_material m on a.mainmid = m.id left join t_erp_customer c on c.id=m.supplier left join t_picture pic on m.image=pic.id left join ( select max(shopid) shopid,max(warehouseid) warehouseid,materialid , sum( case when status like 'inbound_%' then quantity else 0 end ) inbound, sum( case when status like 'outbound_%' then quantity else 0 end ) outbound, sum( case when status='fulfillable' then quantity else 0 end ) fulfillable from t_erp_inventory where shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} group by materialid ) i2 on i2.materialid=a.submid
where submid = #{submid,jdbcType=CHAR} and m.isDelete =0 ORDER BY m.sku desc

select a.*,IFNULL(pic.location,pic.url) image,m.name mname, m.color mcolor,ifnull(m.boxnum,0) boxnum, m.sku sku ,m.price subprice , m.supplier supplierid,c.name supplier,m.delivery_cycle deliverycycle from t_erp_assembly a left join t_erp_material m on a.submid = m.id left join t_erp_customer c on c.id=m.supplier left join t_picture pic on m.image=pic.id where mainmid = #{mainmid,jdbcType=CHAR} ORDER BY m.sku desc

select a.submid,a.subnumber,IFNULL(pic.location,pic.url) image,m.name mname, m.sku sku ,ifnull(inv.quantity,0) inventoryqty from t_erp_assembly a left join t_erp_material m on a.submid = m.id left join t_picture pic on m.image=pic.id left join t_erp_inventory inv on inv.materialid=m.id and inv.warehouseid=#{warehouseid,jdbcType=CHAR} and inv.status='fulfillable' where mainmid = #{mainmid,jdbcType=CHAR} ORDER BY m.sku desc
mapper.delete: delete from t_erp_assembly where mainmid is null
